fields.name: Backgammon
fields.description: A two-player game where each player has fifteen pieces that move between twenty-four triangles according to the roll of two dice. The objective of the game is to be the first to bear off.

fields.name: Go
fields.description: The oldest board game in the world. Go is an abstract strategy board game for two players in which the aim is to surround more territory than the opponent.
